column1: Uchi////This place is amazing! Best sushi in town. Great experience! The staff is really nice
column2: but the wait can be a little long (1 hour) so make reservations. The food is omg-where-can-I-start. Everything is correctly flavored
column4: and the ambience is perfect. If it's your first time there
column5: the waiters will choose plates based in your preferences
column6: and is super helpful. This is a must try!
